title: Amazon API Gateway with a HTTP integration
description: Create a REST API Gateway with a public HTTP endpoint integration

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern deploys an Amazon API Gateway REST API endpoint with a simple public HTTP endpoint integration.

bullets.text: Create a REST API Gateway with a public HTTP endpoint integration
